thread.title: Off-duty Athens firefighter dies after accident
thread.title_full: Off-duty Athens firefighter dies after accident

author: Lauren Foreman
title: Off-duty Athens firefighter dies after accident

organizations.name: athens-clarke county fire and emergency services

text:
An off-duty Athens-Clarke County firefighter died after a tree limb fell on him in Jackson County, according to a report.
The Athens-Clarke County Fire and Emergency Services said in a Facebook post that “a tragic accident” Monday led to the death of Matt Hughes.
The agency did not say what kind of accident killed Hughes. But WGAU-AM in Athens reported Hughes was helping a friend trim trees when the limb hit him.
Hughes was taken to Northeast Georgia Medical Center in Gainesville, where he later died, according to the radio station.
No other details about the accident were released.
“We would like to send our prayers and condolences to Matt's family and friends,” the fire department said in the post.
In other news:
Woman Jumps On Attacker's Back To Rescue Injured Officer
